mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY B.BOARD_NO DESC) AS RN , B.BOARD_NO , B.BOARD_TITLE , B.BOARD_CONTENT , B.BOARD_HIT , B.CREATE_DT , B.MODIFY_DT , B.USER_NO , U.USER_NAME FROM BOARD_T B INNER JOIN USER_T U ON B.USER_NO = U.USER_NO ) a WHERE RN BETWEEN #{begin} AND #{end}

SELECT B.BOARD_NO, B.BOARD_TITLE, B.BOARD_CONTENT, B.BOARD_HIT, B.CREATE_DT, B.MODIFY_DT, B.USER_NO, U.USER_NAME FROM BOARD_T B INNER JOIN USER_T U ON B.USER_NO = U.USER_NO WHERE B.BOARD_NO = #{boardNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD_T SET BOARD_TITLE = #{boardTitle}, BOARD_CONTENT = #{boardContent}, MODIFY_DT = TO_CHAR(CURRENT_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS) WHERE BOARD_NO = #{boardNo}
